subTitle: Find Answers to All Your Questions About the Event, Speakers, and More.

faqs.question: Is the event in online or offline mode?
faqs.answer: The event will be held in offline mode and the location will be revealed soon.

faqs.question: Will there be a screening of the event inside NCIT?
faqs.answer: Yes, there will be screenings of the event inside the institute premises.

faqs.question: Can the audience interact with the speaker?
faqs.answer: No, there will be no Q&A session or interaction with the speaker as per the TEDx rules

faqs.question: Will there be charges for offline mode ?
faqs.answer: Yes, there will be charges for offline mode but will be minimal for the students of NCIT.

faqs.question: How do I apply to be a speaker at the event?
faqs.answer: If you have ‘any ideas worth spreading’ and it matches our theme, please contact us at tedx@ncit.edu.np or any of our social media pages.

faqs.question: Will there be recreational events in between the talks (music, storytelling, dance performance etc.)? If so, how can I register to perform?
faqs.answer: Yes, there will be charges for offline mode but will be minimal for the students of NCIT.

faqs.question: Can I get recording of the event afterwards?
faqs.answer: Yes, the recordings of all the talks will be uploaded on the TEDx official Youtube channel
